text:
Trifork | Stockholm Sweden | Full Time

http://trifork.se/

Looking for fullstack developers, interested in:

1) Automation, Docker, Mesos, Kubernetes, Serf, etc.

2) Java / JS web development for advanced UIs.

Big Plusses are:

- Love for Functional Programming

- Community Creation, Meetups, Conference Management

- Love Testing

- Love Sharing Knowledge with your co-workers
